467:1: atha khalu bhagavan bhaiṣajyarājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhya tānyaśītiṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇyāmantrayate sma-paśyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja asyāṃ parṣadi bahudevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyān bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ śrāvakayānīyān pratyekabuddhayāniyān bodhisattvayānīyāṃśca,
467:6: yairasyāṃ parṣadi antaśaḥ ekāpi gāthā śrutā,
467:9: sarvā etā ahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja catasraḥ parṣado vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
467:10: ye'pi kecid bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti,
467:13: tānapyahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrān va kuladuhitṛrvā vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
467:14: paripūrṇabuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāvinaste bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaiṣyanti|
467:17: ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti saṃgrāhayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti,
467:23: ye kecid bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti anumodayiṣyanti vā,
467:25: tatra bhaiṣajyarāja yaḥ kaścidanyataraḥ puruṣo vā strī vā evaṃ vadet-kīdṛśāḥ khalvapi te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti?
467:26: tasya bhaiṣajyarāja puruṣasya vā striyā vā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā darśayitavyaḥ,
467:27: ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayitā śrāvayitā vā deśayitā vā sagauravo veha dharmaparyāye|
467:28: ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
467:32: sa hi bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va tathāgato veditavyaḥ sadevakena lokena|
467:35: kaḥ punarvādo ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāpta mudgṛhṇīyād dhārayedvā vācayedvā paryavāpnuyādvā prakāśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā,
467:37: tatra ca pustake satkāraṃ kuryāt gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvādyāñjalinamaskāraiḥ praṇāmaiḥ|
467:38: pariniṣpannaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau veditavyaḥ|
467:40: lokasya hitānukampakaḥ praṇidhānavaśenopapanno'smin jambudvīpe manuṣyeṣu asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanatāyaiḥ|
467:41: yaḥ svayamudāraṃ dharmābhisaṃskāramudārāṃ ca buddhakṣetropapattiṃ sthāpayitvā asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanahetormayi parinirvṛte sattvānāṃ hitārthamanukampārthaṃ ca ihopapanno veditavyaḥ|
467:42: tathāgatadūtaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ|
467:43: tathāgatakṛtyakarastathāgatasaṃpreṣitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñātavyaḥ,
467:44: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saṃprakāśayet,
467:45: antaśo rahasi cauryeṇāpi kasyacidekasattvasyāpi saṃprakāśayedācakṣīta vā||
467:46: yaḥ khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva sattvo duṣṭacittaḥ pāpacitto raudracittastathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ kalpamavarṇaṃ bhāṣet,
467:47: yaśca teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmasya sūtrāntasya dhārakāṇāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā ekāmapi vācamapriyāṃ saṃśrāvayed bhūtāṃ vā abhūtāṃ vā,
467:50: tathāgatabhāraṇapratimaṇḍitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ|
467:52: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati|
467:54: tena tenaiva sattvairañjalīkaraṇīyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyo'rcayitavyo'pacāyitavyo divyamānuṣyakaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvādyakhādyabhojyānnapānayānairagraprāptaiśca divyai ratnarāśibhiḥ|
467:55: sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ,
467:58: apyeva nāma ekavāramapi imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃśrāvayet,
467:59: yaṃ śrutvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpadyeyuḥ||
467:60: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
467:62: satkartavyāśca te sattvā ye dhārenti imaṃ nayam||1||
467:63: sarvajñatvaṃ ca yo icchet kathaṃ śīrghaṃ bhavediti|
467:64: sa imaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ satkuryādvāpi dhārakam||2||
467:67: upapattiṃ śūbhāṃ tyaktvā sa dhīra iha āgataḥ|
467:69: upapatti vaśā tasya yena so dṛśyate tahi|
467:70: paścime kāli bhāṣanto idaṃ sūtraṃ niruttaram||5||
467:84: mayā ca so preṣita mānuṣaṃ bhavam|
467:99: bahuṃ khu so tatra labheta puṇyaṃ
467:113: bahavo hi mayā bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyā bhāṣitāḥ,
467:115: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyāṇāmayameva dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīkaḥ sarvalokāśraddadhanīyaḥ|
467:119: api tu khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaracchannāste kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā veditavyāḥ|
467:123: tathāgatavihāraikasthānanivāsinaśca te bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti,
467:125: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śraddadhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca saṃśrāvayiṣyanti||
467:126: yasmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā,
467:127: tasmin bhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatacaityaṃ kārayitavyaṃ mahantaṃ ratnamayamuccaṃ pragṛhītam|
467:131: yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā paṭhyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā likhyeta vā likhito vā pustakagatastiṣṭhet|
467:132: tasmiṃśca stūpe satkāro gurukāro mānanā pūjanā arcanā karaṇīyā sarvapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ|
467:134: ye ca khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sattvāstaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ labheran vandanāya pūjanāya darśanāya vā,
467:135: sarve te bhaiṣajyarāja abhyāsannībhūtā veditavyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
467:137: bahavo bhaiṣajyarāja gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāśca bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
467:138: na ca punarimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ labhante darśanāya vā śravaṇāya vā likhanāya vā pūjanāya vā|
467:139: na tāvatte bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ kuśalā bhavanti,
467:143: tasmin samaye te āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
467:145: tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva puruṣo bhavedudakārthī udakagaveṣī|
467:147: sa yāvat paśyecchuṣkaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ pāṃsuṃ nirvāhyamānam,
467:150: atha pareṇa samayena sa puruṣa ārdrapaṃsumudakasaṃniśraṃ kardamapaṅkabhutamudakabindubhiḥ sravadbhirnirvāhyamānaṃ paśyet,
467:152: atha khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sa puruṣastatpūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣkāṅkṣo bhavennirvicikitsaḥ-āsannamidaṃ khalūdakamiti|
467:153: evameva bhaiṣajyarāja dūre te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
467:156: yadā khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti avataranti svādhyāyanti cintayanti bhavayanti,
467:162: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyet,
467:163: navayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ|
467:164: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyo'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta,
467:165: adhimānikaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo veditavyaḥ||
467:166: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayet,
467:167: tena bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatalayanaṃ praviśya tathāgatacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya tathāgatasyāsane niṣadya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ|
467:173: tattena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prāvaritavyam|
467:178: anavalīnacittena bodhisattvena purastādbodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ|
467:179: anyalokadhātusthitaścāhaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja tasya kulaputrasya nirmitaiḥ parṣadaḥ samāvartayiṣyāmi|
467:181: te tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhāṣitaṃ na pratibādhiṣyanti,
467:186: yāni ca asya asmāddharmaparyāyāt padavyañjanāni paribhraṣṭāni bhaviṣyanti,
467:188: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
467:190: durlabho vai śravo hyasya adhimuktī pi durlabhā||16||
467:191: udakārthī yathā kaścit khānayet kūpa jaṅgale|
467:192: śuṣkaṃ ca pāṃsu paśyeta khānyamāne punaḥ punaḥ||17||
467:193: so dṛṣṭvā cintayettatra dūre vāri ito bhavet|
467:195: yadā tu ārdraṃ paśyeta pāṃsuṃ snigdhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ |
467:196: niṣṭhā tasya bhavettatra nāsti dūre jalaṃ iha||19||
467:197: evameva tu te dūre buddhajñānasya tādṛśāḥ|
467:201: te bhonti saṃnikṛṣṭā vai buddhajñānasya paṇḍitāḥ|
467:203: jinasya lenaṃ praviśitvā prāvaritvā mi cīvaram|
467:206: śūnyatā cāsanaṃ mahyamatra sthitvā hi deśayet||24||
467:207: loṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ vātha śaktī ākrośa tarjanātha vā|
467:208: bhāṣantasya bhavettatra smaranto mama tā sahet||25||
467:211: ahaṃ pi tasya vīrasya yo mahya parinirvṛte|
467:212: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeyā preṣeṣye bahu nirmitān||27||
467:214: tasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti parṣadaśca samā api||28||
467:216: ye cāpi tasya dāsyanti vāreṣyanti sma nirmitāḥ||29||
467:221: tahiṃ ca sya viharato ekasya vanacāriṇaḥ|
